Class PipeNetworkEntity

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.CapabilityProvider<net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity>
net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity
com.larashores.laraspipes.network.PipeNetworkEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilityProvider, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilityProviderImpl<net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity>, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilitySerializable<net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag>, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlockEntity, net.minecraftforge.common.util.INBTSerializable<net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ItemDepositorEntity, ItemExtractorEntity, ItemPipeEntity
public abstract class PipeNetworkEntity extends net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity
BlockEntity for a block that belongs to a PipeNetwork.

  • Constructor Details

    • PipeNetworkEntity

      public PipeNetworkEntity(net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntityType<?> block, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos, net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state)
      Creates a new PipeNetworkEntity.
      Parameters:
      block - Block type associated with the entity.
      pos - Position to add the entity at.
      state - Block state of the block the entity is attached to.

  • Method Details

    • onLoad

      public void onLoad()
      Called when this entity is added to a world. Adds the entity to an adjacent PipeNetwork or creates a new one.

    • setRemoved

      public void setRemoved()
      Called when this entity is removed from a world. Removes the entity from the pipe network, if it exists.
      Overrides:
      setRemoved in class net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity

    • getNetwork

      public PipeNetwork getNetwork()
      Gets the PipeNetwork that this entity belongs to, if it exists. If it does not exist, returns null.
      Returns:
      The potentially null PipeNetwork that this entity belongs to.

    • setNetwork

      public void setNetwork(PipeNetwork network)
      Sets the PipeNetwork that this entity is a part of.
      Parameters:
      network - The network to add the entity to.

    • clearNetwork

      public void clearNetwork()
      Removes this entity from its PipeNetwork.

    • getOrCreateNetwork

      public PipeNetwork getOrCreateNetwork(net.minecraft.world.level.Level level, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos)
      Gets the PipeNetwork that the entity belongs to if it exists. If it doesn't exist, creates a new network.
      Parameters:
      level - The level the position belongs to.
      pos - The position of the entity.
      Returns:
      The PipeNetwork that the entity belongs to.

    • acceptsItems

      public boolean acceptsItems()
      Meant to be defined by child classes. Determines if the entity can accept items from within a PipeNetwork.
      Returns:
      Whether the entity can accept items.

    • transferItems

      public void transferItems(net.minecraft.world.level.Level level, net.minecraftforge.items.IItemHandler from)
      If the acceptsItems() method of a child class True, this method should be implemented such that it transfers items out of the specified container.
      Parameters:
      level - The level the container belongs to.
      from - The item handler to transfer items out of.

    • compare

      public int compare(PipeNetworkEntity other, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos)
      Used for sorting. Compares a PipeNetworkEntity to another PipeNetworkEntity relative to a specified BlockPos. The entity closer to the specified block is considered the smallest.
      Parameters:
      other - The other PipeNetworkEntity to compare to.
      pos - The BlockPos to compare from
      Returns:
      -1 if the PipeNetworkEntity is less than the other PipeNetworkEntity, 1 if it is greater, otherwise 0 if they are equal.

    • getNeighbors

      public List<net.minecraft.core.BlockPos> getNeighbors()
      Returns all BlockPos's that neighbor a PipeNetworkEntity. Used for searching connected blocks when creating or adding to a PipeNetwork.
      Returns:
      The neighboring BlockPos's.
